name: backend-exercises
description: Backend exercises for Full Stack Open 2019 Course.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Full-stack-open-exercises/part2/part2b-phone_book && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../backend-phonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Madhubala Jayakumaran
